mapper.select:
select si.id, si.code, si.name, si.sex, si.status, si.dept_id, si.images, si.create_date, si.user_id, si.pharmacy_id, si.is_admin, pi.name AS pharmacyName from staff_info si left join pharmacy_info pi on (pi.id = si.pharmacy_id) where 1 = 1
AND si.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{staffInfo.code},'%')
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{staffInfo.name},'%')
AND si.status = #{staffInfo.status}
order by si.create_date desc
